input_sources.content:
Build a modern task management application with the following features:

1. User Authentication
- Users should be able to register with email and password
- Users should be able to log in and log out
- Password reset functionality via email

2. Task Management
- Users can create, edit, and delete tasks
- Tasks have title, description, due date, and priority
- Tasks can be marked as complete or incomplete
- Users can organize tasks into projects

3. Collaboration
- Users can share projects with other users
- Team members can be assigned to specific tasks
- Real-time notifications for task updates

4. Dashboard
- Overview of all tasks and projects
- Calendar view of upcoming deadlines
- Progress tracking and analytics

5. Mobile Responsive
- Application should work well on desktop and mobile devices
- Clean, modern UI with intuitive navigation

From: stakeholder@company.com
To: dev-team@company.com
Subject: Additional Requirements for Task Management App
Date: 2024-01-16

Hi Team,

After reviewing the initial requirements, I have a few additional features that would be valuable:

1. Integration with Google Calendar and Outlook for deadline syncing
2. Time tracking functionality for billable hours
3. File attachments on tasks (up to 10MB per file)
4. Commenting system on tasks for team discussion
5. Export functionality (PDF reports, CSV data)
6. API access for third-party integrations

Priority order:
- High: Time tracking, Calendar integration
- Medium: File attachments, Comments
- Low: Export, API access

Please factor these into the architecture planning.

Best regards,
Stakeholder
